## react-hooks package

A collection of React utility hooks.

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [useBoolean(initialValue)](./react-hooks.useboolean.md) | Use a boolean value. |
|  [useConst(fn)](./react-hooks.useconst.md) | Use a memorized value. |
|  [useConstFn(fn)](./react-hooks.useconstfn.md) | Use a memorized function. |
|  [useCounter(initialValue)](./react-hooks.usecounter.md) | Use a counter. |
|  [useForceUpdate()](./react-hooks.useforceupdate.md) | Use a function to force component update. |
|  [useLocalStorage(key, options)](./react-hooks.uselocalstorage.md) | Use local storage value. |
|  [useMediaQuery(query)](./react-hooks.usemediaquery.md) | Use the matching result of a media query. |
|  [useMount(effect)](./react-hooks.usemount.md) | Use <code>ComponentDidMount</code>. |
|  [useSessionStorage(key, options)](./react-hooks.usesessionstorage.md) | Use session storage value. |
|  [useStorage(key, options)](./react-hooks.usestorage.md) | Use storage value. |
|  [useTheme(options)](./react-hooks.usetheme.md) | Use current theme. |
|  [useToggle(left, right, options)](./react-hooks.usetoggle.md) | Use an either-or value. |
|  [useUnmount(cleanup)](./react-hooks.useunmount.md) | Use <code>ComponentWillUnmount</code>. |
|  [useUpdate(effect, deps)](./react-hooks.useupdate.md) | Use <code>ComponentDidUpdate</code>. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [UseBooleanResult](./react-hooks.usebooleanresult.md) | A boolean value, and functions to update it. |
|  [UseCounterResult](./react-hooks.usecounterresult.md) | Contains a counter and some functions to update it. |
|  [UseStorageOptions](./react-hooks.usestorageoptions.md) | Options to interact with storage. |
|  [UseStorageResult](./react-hooks.usestorageresult.md) | Contains current stored value, and a function to update it. |
|  [UseThemeOptions](./react-hooks.usethemeoptions.md) | Options to custom theme. |
|  [UseThemeResult](./react-hooks.usethemeresult.md) | Current theme, and functions to update it. |
|  [UseToggleOptions](./react-hooks.usetoggleoptions.md) | Options of useToggle. |
|  [UseToggleResult](./react-hooks.usetoggleresult.md) | An either-or value, and functions to update it. |

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Theme](./react-hooks.theme.md) | Theme type. |

|  [UseLocalStorageResult](./react-hooks.uselocalstorageresult.md) | Contains current stored value, and a function to update it. |
|  [UseSessionStorageOptions](./react-hooks.usesessionstorageoptions.md) | Options to interact with session storage. |
|  [UseSessionStorageResult](./react-hooks.usesessionstorageresult.md) | Contains current stored value, and a function to update it. |
